page.title: 19GUITING POWER.MANOR FARMS
page.content: The Farm Manager is responsible for the livestock and growing the grain. They keep beef and dairy cattle. The crops they grow are spring wheat and barley,and winter wheat and barley. Some fields are kept for permanent pasture, some are ley which is short- term grass. The fields cover 1162 acres. For the harvest, they use 6 tractors and 2 combines. Crops are sprayed with fungicides and herbicides which they spray from a mounted sprayer pulled by a tractor.They make sure that it is not harmful to wild life. It is helpful to keep cattle because they build up fertility in the soil which could become nitrogen deficient. Fertilisers are also used. Five workers look after all this.
